Notes:

* Please note that the Web sites of MPs and Caucuses are not part of the Web Site of the Parliament of Canada.

 
Please note that information such as "roles" and "elections" for individuals who were Members of previous Parliaments is available from the 36th Parliament (i.e. September 1997) on. For information about those who were Members prior to 1997, please consult Members of the House of Commons Historical Information.
